verses.verse: <S%G2112>Immediately<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G4404>morning<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G4160>held<s%> a <S%G4824>consultation,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G667>carried<s%> him <S%G667>away,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him up to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> he used to <S%G630>release<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner,<s%> <S%G3746>whom<s%> they asked of <S%G154>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>There<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> one <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas,<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> had made <S%G4955>insurrection,<s%> men <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4714>insurrection<s%> had <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G5408>murder.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> crying <S%G310>aloud,<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2531>ask<s%> him to do <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4160>he<s%> <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> for <S%G846>them.<s%>
<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Do <S%G2309>you<s%> want me to <S%G630>release<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G383>stirred<s%> up the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he <S%G630>should<s%> <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3123>instead.<s%>

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G2036>asked<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> should I <S%G4160>do<s%> to him <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2309>you<s%> <S%G3004>call<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%>"

<S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G1014>wishing<s%> <S%G4160>to<s%> <S%G2425>please<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G630>released<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>handed<s%> over <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when he had <S%G5417>flogged<s%> <S%G2443>him,<s%> to be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G520>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G520>away<s%> <S%G2080>within<s%> the <S%G3739>court,<s%> <S%G2076>which<s%> is the <S%G4232>Praetorium;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they called <S%G4779>together<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4686>cohort.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with <S%G4209>purple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> weaving a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns,<s%> <S%G2532>they<s%> put it <S%G4060>on<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G5180>struck<s%> <S%G5180>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> with a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1716>spat<s%> on <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>bowing<s%> their <S%G1119>knees,<s%> did <S%G4352>homage<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> they had <S%G1702>mocked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they took the <S%G4209>purple<s%> <S%G1562>off<s%> <S%G1562>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1746>put<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> on <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1806>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1806>out<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G29>compelled<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> passing <S%G3855>by,<s%> coming <S%G2064>from<s%> <S%G575>the<s%> <S%G68>country,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G223>Alexander<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4504>Rufus,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> go with <S%G142>them,<s%> that he might bear <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4716>cross.<s%>

Let the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> come <S%G575>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G2532>him.<s%>" Those <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3679>insulted<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>At<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G994>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1682>"Eloi,<s%> <S%G1682>Eloi,<s%> <S%G2982>lama<s%> <S%G4518>sabachthani?<s%>" <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> <S%G3450>"My<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> have you <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> <S%G1519>me?<s%>"
<S%G5100>Some<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> stood <S%G3936>by,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3004>it,<s%> said, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> he is <S%G5455>calling<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah.<s%>"

<S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G5143>ran,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1072>filling<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge<s%> <S%G1072>full<s%> of <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%> <S%G4060>put<s%> it on a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G4222>gave<s%> it to <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G4222>drink,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Let him <S%G863>be.<s%> <S%G1492>Let<s%>'s see <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to <S%G2507>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2507>down.<s%>"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G863>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and gave up the <S%G1606>spirit.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G1727>opposite<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2896>he<s%> <S%G3779>cried<s%> <S%G2896>out<s%> like this and breathed his <S%G1606>last,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G230>"Truly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

<S%G2532>When<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G3904>Preparation<s%> <S%G3739>Day,<s%> that <S%G2076>is,<s%> the day before the <S%G4315>Sabbath,<s%>

<S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G707>Arimathaea,<s%> a <S%G2158>prominent<s%> council <S%G1010>member<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> was <S%G4327>looking<s%> <S%G2258>for<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2064>came.<s%> He <S%G5111>boldly<s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G154>asked<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>' <S%G4983>body.<s%>
<S%G2532>When<s%> he <S%G1097>found<s%> out <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> he <S%G1433>granted<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G59>bought<s%> a <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G2532>cloth,<s%> and <S%G2507>taking<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2507>down,<s%> wound him <S%G1750>in<s%> the <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G2532>cloth,<s%> and <S%G2698>laid<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G2998>cut<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G4073>rock.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4351>rolled<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>
